title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 § 597.3 - List of hazardous substances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 § 597.3 - List of hazardous substances

State Regulations

Table 1 sets forth the list of hazardous substances in
alphabetic order. Table 2 sets forth the list of hazardous substances in

Chemical Abstract Service (CAS) number order. Table 1: Hazardous Substances - Sorted by Name

1
A Substances noted "A" are acutely hazardous
substances. 1

Notification of the release of
an RQ (Reportable Quantity) of solid particles of antimony, arsenic, beryllium, cadmium, chromium, copper, lead, nickel, selenium, silver, thallium or zinc is
not required if the mean diameter of the particles released is larger than 100
micrometers (0.004 inches). 2

The RQ for asbestos is limited
to friable forms only. 3

Indicates that no RQ is being
assigned to the generic or broad class. 4

Includes mineral fiber
emissions from facilities manufacturing or processing glass, rock, or slag
fibers (or other mineral derived fibers) of average diameter one micrometer or
less. 5

Includes mono- and di-ethers
of ethylene glycol, diethylene glycol, and triethylene glycol
R-(OCH2CH2)n-OR"TM where: n=1, 2, or 3; R = alkyl C7 or less; or R = phenyl or
alkyl substituted phenyl; R"TM = H or alkyl C7 or less; or OR"TM consisting of
carboxylic acid ester, sulfate, phosphate, nitrate, or sulfonate. 6

Includes organic compounds
with more than one benzene ring, and which have a boiling point greater than or
equal to 100°C. Table 2: Hazardous Substances - Sorted by CAS Number

not required if the mean diameter of the particles released is larger than 100

The RQ for asbestos is limited
to friable forms only. 3

Indicates that no RQ is being

Includes mineral fiber
emissions from facilities manufacturing or processing glass, rock, or slag
fibers (or other mineral derived fibers) of average diameter one micrometer or
less. 5

Includes mono- and di-ethers

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
